name: Monadwars.github.io
body:
So this isn't so much a coding project as it is a Collectable Role Playing Card Game (CRPCG?). 

List of assets:

[Alpha RuleBook v0.2.pdf](https://github.com/monadwars/monadwars.github.io/raw/master/AlphaRuleBookv0.2.pdf) = Rulebook intended for end users. If you want to play a game of "Monad Wars" this will be all you need to read.

[CCGDesignDocument.doc.docx](https://github.com/monadwars/monadwars.github.io/raw/master/CCGDesignDocument.doc.docx) = Monad Wars design documentation. To be the one stop location to go if you are looking to develop balanced cards. Should change the format to more of a SoP.

[card db.xlsx](https://github.com/monadwars/monadwars.github.io/raw/master/card%20db.xlsx) = The table contianing all of the current Monad Wars card information. this is used to generate cards in Card Maker Beta 0.98.0.10.

index.html = will use to host a decent enough page.

[Monad.7z](https://github.com/monadwars/monadwars.github.io/raw/master/Monad/Monad.7z) = The location of all the cards for printing purpose.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
